name: Papo World Dinosaur Island
summary: Purple Pink the Bunny loves dinosaurs more than anything. One day she found a mystery dinosaur island! Would you like to join Purple and take a tour on the island? The most exciting thing is that you could seek for dinosaur eggs! There are many eggs hidden in the island. You could find them all and hatch the eggs. Given love and patience, the baby dinos will soon break the shells and meet with us!
